# disconnectReceiver(name:)

**Instance Method**

Disconnects a specific remote preview receiver associated with the name provided when [doc://com.apple.immersivemediasupport/documentation/ImmersiveMediaSupport/ImmersiveMediaRemotePreviewSender/connectReceiver(name:endpoint:)] was called.

## Declaration

```swift
func disconnectReceiver(name: String) async
```
